iomanager

Class InputReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • iomanager.InputReader

  • public class InputReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to manage input files. It should open an input.txt file which contains a list of *.csv containing Customer data to be analyzed.
    Author:
    Bryan J Sanchez

      Creates a list of the lists of Customers obtained from *.csv files at directory where the input.txt input file was opened.
      java.lang.String getDirectory() 
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getInputList()
      Generate a list with names of input files to be analyzed by the simulators.

      • getCustomersLists

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Customer>> getCustomersLists(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> inputList)
        Creates a list of the lists of Customers obtained from *.csv files at directory where the input.txt input file was opened.
        Parameters:
        inputList - List of filenames containing Customer data.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of all the lists of Customers to be evaluated on the simulations.
